commit message:
Modified color scheme to make the blue color more visible.

Updated version information for the next upcoming release.

Added app icons with nicer 'round' corners for different resolutions (ldpi, mdpi, hdpi)

Modified manifest, so the app can be backup up with full system backups.

Prepared use of BackupManager by adding the backup api key to the manifest.
Updated play store logo and app icons
Added app icon for xhdpi density and added baseline icons again (Issue #18)

Implemented interactive details list (Issue #17)

Bugfix: Added missing Cursor.close() to PeriodicalDatabase.loadRawData()

Updated screenshots for publishing.

Reworked layout to display focused calendar entries properly.

Updated color scheme to have more vivid 'blue' elements.

Extended help text for the interactive list feature  (Issue #17)
